trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides concurrency management for classes that support asynchronous method calls.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the synchronization context for the asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The synchronization context for the asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object used to associate a piece of client state, such as a task ID, with a particular asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xx x xxxx XX$ xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.
